Detailed Description

Class that creates and updates cartoon sky, sky objects and weather effects. Implements a FrameListener, so it could be added as such to the Root in order to automatically update itself each frame.

Member Function Documentation

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::addRain (  ) 

Method that, if no rain particle system can be found, creates one and reapplies the wind vector on all running particle systems.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::addSnow (  ) 

Method that, if no snow particle system can be found, creates one and reapplies the wind vector on all running particle systems.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::addWindVector ( Ogre::Vector3  vWind  ) 

Adds a vector representing wind direction to the CartoonSystem. The vector is stored and applied to all running particle systems. A cloud is also created in the opposite direction of the wind vector.

Parameters:
wind The vector to set as the current wind vector.
virtual bool CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::frameStarted ( const Ogre::FrameEvent &  e  )  [protected, virtual]

Implementation of FrameListener method, run at the start of every frame.

Parameters:
e the Frame»vent for the current frame.

the time between updates.
bool CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::hasRain (  ) 

Checks if CartoonSystem has a running rain particle system.

Returns:
true if rain particle system is not a nullpointer.

Checks if CartoonSystem has a running snow particle system.

Creates the moon object for the CartoonSystem.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::makeSky (  )  [protected]

Creates the skydome for the CartoonSystem.

Creates the sun object for the CartoonSystem.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::makeWindCloud (  )  [protected]

Creates the wind cloud object for the CartoonSystem, positioning it at the far horizon.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::removeRain (  ) 

Removes the current rain particle system.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::removeSnow (  ) 

Removes the current snow particle system.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::removeWindCloud (  ) 

Removes the current wind cloud.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::removeWindVector (  ) 

Removes the current vector representing wind direction, and applies this to all running particle systems. The cloud in the opposite direction of the wind vector is also removed.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::setRainDensity ( int  nDensity  ) 

Sets the emitter parameter emission_rate for all emmiters in the current rain particle system.

Parameters:
density The amount of particles emitted per second by each emitter.
void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::setRainVelocity ( int  nMin,
int  nMax 
)

Sets the emitter parameters velocity_min and velocity_max for all emmiters in the current rain particle system.

Parameters:
min The minimum initial velocity of each emitted particle.
max The maximum initial velocity of each emitted particle.

void CartoonCaelum::CartoonSystem::setupResources (  ) 

Method that loads all needed resources into the resource manager. It will load all resources included in the CartoonResources.cfg file, by default added to the Cartoon resource subgroup.

Updates the movement of the moon and its face.
